comment.body: Is there possibility for message sighing? Also multiple user messaging? pleaseeeeeeee :)

> [nofish](#comment_36_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Multiple recipient messaging may be possible later, every content you create in zeronet is signed by your private key, so its also apply to messages.

I meant signing a message by two or more parties...
